attractions.name: City Park
attractions.description: A beautiful 50-acre park with walking trails, playgrounds, and picnic areas. Perfect for family outings and outdoor activities.

attractions.name: Historical Museum
attractions.description: Explore our city's rich history through interactive exhibits and artifacts dating back to the 1800s.

attractions.name: Downtown Shopping District
attractions.description: Vibrant shopping area with local boutiques, restaurants, and monthly street fairs.

attractions.name: Riverfront Plaza
attractions.description: Scenic river views with a boardwalk, outdoor concerts in summer, and ice skating in winter.

attractions.name: Science Center
attractions.description: Interactive science exhibits for all ages, planetarium, and STEM workshops for kids.

attractions.name: Botanical Gardens
attractions.description: Stunning 30-acre gardens featuring native plants, rose gardens, and seasonal flower displays.

attractions.name: Sports Complex
attractions.description: State-of-the-art facilities for baseball, soccer, tennis, and swimming with public access hours.

attractions.name: Performing Arts Center
attractions.description: Hosting Broadway shows, symphony performances, and local theater productions year-round.
